pages.title: Stone Claws
pages.text: Breeding can bring Stats & colors.$(br)Chocobo Stats are$(br)- Stamina$(br)- Health$(br)- Speed

pages.title: Iron Claws
pages.text: is Useful for hatching chocobos a bit faster.$(br)$(item)Currently, These are visually bugged & do not 'remove' the egg after the chicbo hatches from it.$()$(br)- It is safe to break & replace $(item)AFTER THE CHICOBO IS HATCHED$(), just right click it & see if an egg is in the slot$(br)- $(l:delchoco:chocobos/tools)here$(/l)
